page.title: 20HEAT AND LIGHT
page.content:
Most people use coal for heating.The coalman delivers it on his lorry.He carries the sacks to the house.All the villagers,except one use electricity.It is used for light,heating and driving machines.Electricity travels across the country by overhead wires on pylons.It says DANGER on them because of high voltage.A few people use wood,or a mixture of wood and coal.Sometimes people use gas,but it is called Calor Gas.
FIELD WORK Ryan Grundy Michaela Dawson Sarah Ward SCRIBE Ryan Grundy WRITERS Children of Edenham School Junior department July 1985 THE END
